metadata.title: CVE-2020-6860 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
libmysofa 0.9.1 has a stack-based buffer overflow in readDataVar in hdf/dataobject.c during the reading of a header message attribute.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-6860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 1.0~dfsg0-1
libmysofa1 - 1.0~dfsg0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0~dfsg0-1').
